Camera.Flash:: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Hasselblad Color Calibration, LED flash, HDR, panorama

Camera.Video recording:: 4K@30/60/120fps, 1080p@30/60/240fps; gyro-EIS; HDR, 10‑bit video, Dolby Vision, LOG

Design.Colors:: Space Black, Titanium Grey, Velvet Red, White
Design.Materials:: Glass front (Gorilla Glass), glass back (Gorilla Glass), aluminum frame
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

80W wired, 55W PD, 55W PPS, 80W UFCS

10W reverse wireless
